title: Combinations of difference, union, and intersection of two classes

blocks.name: dfss4
blocks.content: Subclass defined in terms of class difference. See comments under ~ dfun2 . (Contributed by NM, 22-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfss4(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0))
} = {
  bitr4i(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c0))
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  eqeq1i(cdif(c1, cdif(c1, c0)), c0, cin(c1, c0))
  difeqri(hs0, c1, cdif(c1, c0), cin(c1, c0))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0))), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  notbii(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  abai(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  iman(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfss4(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 ↔(c1 \(c1 \ c0))= c0)
} = {
  bitr4i(c0 ⊆ c1, (c1 \(c1 \ c0))= c0, (c1 ⋂ c0)= c0)
  sseqin2(c0, c1)
  eqeq1i((c1 \(c1 \ c0)), c0, (c1 ⋂ c0))
  difeqri(hs0, c1, (c1 \ c0), (c1 ⋂ c0))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈(c1 \ c0)), hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c0), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(c1 \ c0), ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c0))
  notbii(hs0 ∈(c1 \ c0), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c0))
  eldif(hs0, c1, c0)
  3bitri(hs0 ∈(c1 ⋂ c0), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c0)))
  elin(hs0, c1, c0)
  abai(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈ c1 → hs0 ∈ c0), ¬(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c0))
  iman(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 \ c0))
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋂ c0))
}

blocks.name: dfun2
blocks.content: An alternate definition of the union of two classes in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables. Along with ~ dfin2 and ~ dfss4 it shows we can express union, intersection, and subset directly in terms of the single "primitive" operation ` \ ` (class difference). (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfun2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cun(c0, c1), cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
} = {
  uneqri(hs0, c0, c1, cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
  bitr4i(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))))
  con2bii(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)), wn(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, c0)
  eldif(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c0), c1)
  ioran(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(universe, cdif(cdif(universe, c0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfun2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⋃ c1)=(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1))
} = {
  uneqri(hs0, c0, c1, (𝕌 \((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1)))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1)), ¬ hs0 ∈((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1))
  con2bii((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1))
  3bitr4i(hs0 ∈((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1), ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c1), (¬ hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c1))
  anbi1i(hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0), ¬ hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0)
  mpbiran(hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c0), ¬ hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eldif(hs0, universe, c0)
  eldif(hs0, (𝕌 \ c0), c1)
  ioran(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  mpbiran(hs0 ∈(𝕌 \((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1)), ¬ hs0 ∈((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1), hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  eldif(hs0, universe, ((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((𝕌 \((𝕌 \ c0)\ c1)))
}

blocks.name: dfin2
blocks.content: An alternate definition of the intersection of two classes in terms of class difference, requiring no dummy variables. See comments under ~ dfun2 . Another version is given by ~ dfin4 . (Contributed by NM, 10-Jun-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfin2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1)))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, c0, c1, cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1)))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1)))))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1))))
  con2bii(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1)))
  mpbiran(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(universe, c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
  vex(hs0)
  eldif(cv(hs0), universe, c1)
  eldif(cv(hs0), c0, cdif(universe, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, cdif(universe, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfin2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⋂ c1)=(c0 \(𝕌 \ c1))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, c0, c1, (c0 \(𝕌 \ c1)))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ∈(c0 \(𝕌 \ c1)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c1)))
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c1))
  con2bii(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c1))
  mpbiran(hs0 ∈(𝕌 \ c1), ¬ hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vex(hs0)
  eldif(hs0, universe, c1)
  eldif(hs0, c0, (𝕌 \ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 \(𝕌 \ c1)))
}

blocks.name: difin
blocks.content: Difference with intersection. Theorem 33 of [Suppes] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm difin(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdif(c0, cin(c0, c1)), cdif(c0, c1))
} = {
  difeqri(hs0, c0, cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1))
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1)), wn(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  pm4.61(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  con2bii(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  3bitr2i(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))))
  anclb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  iman(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm difin(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 \(c0 ⋂ c1))=(c0 \ c1)
} = {
  difeqri(hs0, c0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c0 \ c1))
  3bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)), hs0 ∈(c0 \ c1), ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c1))
  pm4.61(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  con2bii((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)), (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1))
  3bitr2i((hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1), ¬(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)), (hs0 ∈ c0 →(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)), (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)))
  anclb(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  imbi2i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  elin(hs0, c0, c1)
  iman(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1))
  eldif(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 \ c1))
}

blocks.name: dfss5
blocks.content: Alternate definition of subclass relationship: a class ` A ` is a subclass of another class ` B ` iff each element of ` A ` is equal to an element of ` B ` . (Contributed by AV, 13-Nov-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfss5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  dfss3(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  clel5(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfss5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 = s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ⊆ c1, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 = s1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ c1))
  dfss3(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, s0 = s1))
  clel5(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: dfun3
blocks.content: Union defined in terms of intersection (De Morgan's law). Definition of union in [Mendelson] p. 231. (Contributed by NM, 8-Jan-2002.)

blocks.name: dfin3

blocks.name: indi
blocks.content: Distributive law for intersection over union. Exercise 10 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm indi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cin(c0, cun(c1, c2)), cun(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2)))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, c0, cun(c1, c2), cun(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2)))
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  andi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  elun(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cun(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cin(c0, c1), cin(c0, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm indi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⋂(c1 ⋃ c2))=((c0 ⋂ c1)⋃(c0 ⋂ c2))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, c0, (c1 ⋃ c2), ((c0 ⋂ c1)⋃(c0 ⋂ c2)))
  3bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈(c1 ⋃ c2)), hs0 ∈((c0 ⋂ c1)⋃(c0 ⋂ c2)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∨ hs0 ∈ c2)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)∨ hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∨ hs0 ∈ c2)), (hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1)∨ hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∨(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  andi(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c2)
  orbi12i(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c2))
  elin(hs0, c0, c1)
  elin(hs0, c0, c2)
  anbi2i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1 ⋃ c2), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∨ hs0 ∈ c2))
  elun(hs0, c1, c2)
  elun(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (c0 ⋂ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ⋃ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 ⋂ c1)⋃(c0 ⋂ c2)))
}

blocks.name: undi
blocks.content: Distributive law for union over intersection. Exercise 11 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2002.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm undi(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cun(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cin(cun(c0, c1), cun(c0, c2)))
} = {
  uneqri(hs0, c0, cin(c1, c2), cin(cun(c0, c1), cun(c0, c2)))
  3bitri(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cun(c0, c1), cun(c0, c2))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  orbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  ordi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  bitr2i(wa(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cun(c0, c1), cun(c0, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2))))
  elin(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1), cun(c0, c2))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c0, c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  elun(cv(hs0), c0, c2)

  eldif(hs0, c2, c0)
  eldif(hs0, (c0 ⋃ c1), (c2 \ c0))
  3bitri(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋃(c1 \ c2)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1)∧(¬ hs0 ∈ c2 ∨ hs0 ∈ c0)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈(c1 \ c2)), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∨(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  elun(hs0, c0, (c1 \ c2))
  orbi2i(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(c1 \ c2), (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2))
  eldif(hs0, c1, c2)
  bitri((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1)∧(¬ hs0 ∈ c2 ∨ hs0 ∈ c0)), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1)∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  ordi(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)
  anbi2i((hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ hs0 ∈ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∨ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2), (¬ hs0 ∈ c2 ∨ hs0 ∈ c0))
  orcom(hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋃(c1 \ c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(((c0 ⋃ c1)\(c2 \ c0)))
}

blocks.name: difin2
blocks.content: Represent a class difference as an intersection with a larger difference. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm difin2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c2), cin(cdif(c1, c2), c0)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cdif(c0, c2), cin(cdif(c1, c2), c0), wss(c0, c1))
  3bitr4g(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  anbi1d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  pm4.71d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  3bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cdif(c1, c2), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  elin(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2), c0)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  ancom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  anass(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(cdif(c1, c2), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm difin2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 →(c0 \ c2)=((c1 \ c2)⋂ c0))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c0 \ c2), ((c1 \ c2)⋂ c0), c0 ⊆ c1)
  3bitr4g(c0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈(c0 \ c2), hs0 ∈((c1 \ c2)⋂ c0), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2))
  anbi1d(c0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ hs0 ∈ c2, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  pm4.71d(c0 ⊆ c1, hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  ssel(c0, c1, hs0)
  eldif(hs0, c0, c2)
  3bitri(hs0 ∈((c1 \ c2)⋂ c0), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈(c1 \ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  elin(hs0, (c1 \ c2), c0)
  anbi1i(hs0 ∈(c1 \ c2), hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2))
  eldif(hs0, c1, c2)
  bitr4i(((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 ∈ c0), ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1)∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)))
  ancom((hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ c2), hs0 ∈ c0)
  anass(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, ¬ hs0 ∈ c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 \ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(((c1 \ c2)⋂ c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ⊆ c1)
}

blocks.name: dif32
blocks.content: Swap second and third argument of double difference. (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-2004.)

blocks.name: difabs
blocks.content: Absorption-like law for class difference: you can remove a class only once. (Contributed by FL, 2-Aug-2009.)

blocks.name: dfsymdif3
blocks.content: Alternate definition of the symmetric difference, given in Example 4.1 of [Stoll] p. 262 (the original definition corresponds to [Stoll] p. 13). (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.) (Revised by BJ, 30-Apr-2020.)
